devdoc.author: Pickle Solutions https://github.com/picklesolutions
devdoc.details: For this example, we are using a fictional token called UniartsNFT

createOffer(uint256,uint256).details: Puts an item on the marketplace

params.price: The price expected by the seller

openMarketplace().details: Opens the market if the contract address is correct

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPayCoinContractAddress(string,address.details: Sets the address of Pay erc20 token contract

setUniartsNFTContractAddress(address).details: Sets the address of our ERC721 token contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawCoins().details: Lets the owner withdraw his coins

withdrawFunds().details: Lets the owner withdraw his funds

devdoc.title: A small marketplace allowing users to buy and sell a specific ERC721 token
